pages.text: $(li)The Dame Fortuna, or aslo known as the Lucky Demon, is a dangerous creature that can be summoned using the $(l:patchouli:bosses/rumor_dame_fortuna)Devil's Ante$(/l).$(br)$(li)It will attack you with spectral blocks, either throwing them at you, or forming squares that you must dodge if you don't want to take a lot of damage.
It drops enchanted books, $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/emerald)Emeralds$(/l) and the $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/meet_your_fight/fortunes_favor)Fortune's Favor$(/l) on death.
